oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Selections from the Edward Padula production of A Joyful Noise
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Home recorded performances of selections from the Edward Padula production of A Joyful Noise.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Shade Motley and the Townspeople performs "A Joyful Noise" / (3:03) Shade Motley and Jenny Lee perform "Until Today" / (5:06) Shade Motley, the Motley Crew, and the Ensemble perform "I Say Yes"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Padula, Edward, 1916-2001
